description: This continuation of 261 emphasizes sight playing, score reading, harmonization and transposition,
more advanced improvisation and harmonic usage, performance preparation, and leadership
from the keyboard. A grade of B- or higher satisfies Piano Proficiency Level 4 requirements.
Prerequisite: Music 261, completion of Piano Proficiency 3, or audition placement. Recommended
co-requisite: Music 214. Offered annually in the spring semester.
